subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This plugin displays all swagger.json files present on a website and display them on a single page using the Swagger UI

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: Simply put the files by following this tree : webapp/plugins/{name-of-the-plugin}/api/swagger/v{version-number}/{name-of-the-file}.json
Using Pluginwizard, it creates and put the file swagger.json in the right place

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: You just have to access the xpage swaggerui : /jsp/site/Portal.jsp?page=swaggerui
Note that the plugin swaggerui only displays the json files of enabled plugins
